TABLE.NAME: kialo
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the kialo activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Unusued (but required by Moodle): Activity description

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Unusued (but required by Moodle): The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: discussion_url
FIELD.COMMENT: The URL of the discussion on Kialo Edu.

FIELD.NAME: discussion_title
FIELD.COMMENT: The title of the discussion (when it was selected).

FIELD.NAME: deployment_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The deployment ID of the discussion.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum score or grade scale.
